name: 2kVA Biomass Gasifier
subtitle: Sustainable & Efficient Power Generation
description: The ESB-R02 2 kVA Biomass Gasifier is a compact, efficient, and eco-friendly energy solution designed for small-scale power generation and research applications. Utilizing biomass gasification technology, this system converts agricultural and forest waste into clean producer gas, making it an excellent alternative to conventional fossil fuel-based generators.

features.text: Eco-Friendly & Sustainable – Converts biomass waste into clean energy
Compact & Portable – Ideal for research institutes and small-scale users
Dry Filtration System – No water-based purification required
Multi-Fuel Compatibility – Runs on various agricultural and forest residues
Automatic Initial Firing – Ensures easy and efficient startup
Reliable & Low Maintenance – Designed for continuous operation with minimal upkeep

technology.text: Biomass Dryer Integration – Utilizes exhaust heat from the silencer to dry biomass, improving efficiency
Patented Filtration System – Extracts moisture from biomass and reuses it to clean the gas, increasing performance and extending filter cleaning intervals

specifications.label: Filtration System
specifications.value: Dry filtration technology (No costly water purification required)

specifications.label: Application
specifications.value: Research institutes, rural electrification, and small-scale industrial use

applications.text: Off-grid power supply
Renewable energy research
Backup power for small-scale operations
Agricultural and rural electrification

benefits.text: Environmentally Friendly – Reduces carbon footprint and promotes green energy
Cost-Effective – Saves fuel costs compared to diesel generators
Low Maintenance – Simple operation with minimal servicing required
Proven Technology – Developed by Enersol Biopower Pvt Ltd, a leader in biomass energy solutions

name: 4kW Biomass Gasifier
subtitle: Transforming Biomass into Reliable Energy
description: The ESB-R04 4 kW (5 kVA) Biomass Gasifier is an advanced, eco-friendly, and cost-effective power solution designed for research institutes, rural electrification, and small-scale energy needs. This gasifier operates on biomass gasification technology, converting agricultural and forest waste into clean producer gas for efficient power generation.

features.text: Sustainable & Cost-Effective – Uses abundant agro-waste for power generation
Compact & Portable – Easy to transport and install in remote locations
Soundproof Design – Ensures quiet operation, ideal for residential and rural applications
Automatic Initial Firing – Reduces manual effort with advanced atomization technology
Dry Filtration System – No need for water-based purification, minimizing maintenance costs
User-Friendly Controls – Simple and intuitive operation for all users

technology.text: Multi-Fuel Compatibility – Works with various agricultural and forest residues
Efficient Gas Production – On-demand producer gas generation with minimal tar content
Low Maintenance & Durable – Rugged construction for long-term reliability
Smart Biomass Utilization – Optimized fuel efficiency for maximum power output

specifications.label: Filtration System
specifications.value: Dry filtration technology (No costly water purification required)

specifications.label: Dimensions
specifications.value: Gasifier: L10 x W7 x H7 ft, Genset: L6 x W3.5 x H6 ft

name: 5kW Biomass Gasifier
subtitle: Transform Your Energy, Transform Your World!
description: The ESB-R05 Biomass Gasifier is a compact, high-efficiency renewable energy solution designed for small-scale electricity needs. Whether for research institutes, rural communities, or standalone power generation, this gasifier offers a cost-effective and eco-friendly alternative by utilizing abundant agricultural and forest waste as fuel. Built with advanced technology, it ensures minimal tar production and hassle-free operation.

features.text: Portable & Compact Design – Easy to transport and install anywhere
Soundproof Operation – Quiet performance, suitable for residential and rural areas
Sustainable Fuel Source – Runs on agro-waste, reducing dependency on fossil fuels

name: 8kW Biomass Gasifier
subtitle: Efficient. Sustainable. Reliable – Powering a Greener Future!
description: The ESB-R08 Biomass Gasifier is an ultra-compact, portable, and soundproof gasifier system that efficiently converts biomass waste into clean energy. Designed for rural electrification, irrigation pumps, and small-scale industries, it offers a low-maintenance and eco-friendly alternative to fossil fuels. The dry filtration system eliminates the need for water-based purification, making it a cost-effective and hassle-free solution.

features.text: India’s Smallest & Most Portable Biomass Gasifier – Easy to transport and install anywhere
Soundproof & Silent Operation – Suitable for rural and urban applications
Automatic Initial Firing – No manual startup effort required
Dry Filtration System – No water needed, reducing operational and maintenance costs
High Fuel Flexibility – Works with agricultural residues, firewood, bamboo, biomass briquettes, and pellets
Eco-Friendly & Cost-Effective – Reduces dependence on fossil fuels and LPG
Reliable & Durable – Built to last in challenging environments

subtitle: Turning Waste into Watts – From Field to Fuel
description: The ESB-R10 Biomass Gasifier by Enersol Biopower Pvt. Ltd. is a cutting-edge, small-scale renewable energy solution designed to convert agricultural and forestry waste into clean, efficient energy. With patented technology and a rugged, compact design, it provides a sustainable and cost-effective alternative to conventional energy sources, making it ideal for villages, research institutions, and small-scale industries.

subtitle: Empowering Sustainability – Clean Energy from Biomass
description: The ESB-R12 Biomass Gasifier by Enersol Biopower Pvt. Ltd. is a next-generation renewable energy solution designed to efficiently convert agricultural and forestry waste into clean power. Engineered with advanced downdraft gasification technology, this system provides an eco-friendly, cost-effective, and versatile energy source, ideal for off-grid communities, farms, industries, and research institutions.

features.text: Compact & Silent Operation – The smallest and most portable biomass gasifier with noise reduction features

name: 24kW Biomass Gasifier
subtitle: Harness the Power of Biomass – A Sustainable Energy Solution
description: The ESB-R24 Biomass Gasifier by Enersol Biopower Pvt. Ltd. is a revolutionary renewable energy system designed to convert organic waste into a reliable and cost-efficient power source. Built with advanced gasification technology, this system offers clean energy for rural electrification, industries, and agricultural applications. With its compact, portable, and low-maintenance design, it is an ideal choice for those seeking off-grid and eco-friendly power solutions.

name: 50kW Biomass Gasifier
subtitle: Transforming Biomass into Power
description: The ESB-R50 Biomass Gasifier is a powerful, efficient, and environmentally friendly energy solution that converts biomass into clean, renewable electricity. Delivering 50kW (62.5KVA) of output, this system is perfect for village electrification, agricultural sites, and off-grid power applications. Its cutting-edge gasification process ensures minimal tar production and high fuel efficiency, making it a cost-effective and sustainable alternative to traditional energy sources.

name: 10000kcal/hr Based Biomass Gasifier
description: We are best known for compact & portable biomass gasifier with our tradition of best manufacturing standards. Our biomass gasifier range starts from 2KW to 200KW. With the help of a strong technical support, we are known for our high standard products & services. We have installed more than 100 biomass gasifiers ranging from 5KW to 200KW with successful operational record. Our prime customer are National Thermal Power Corporation Limited (NTPC), Tata Power Limited (TATA), Indian Oil Corporation Limited (IOCL), Avani Bio Energy Private Limited, KNUST University, Ghana, CSIR, Durgapur, & Junagadh University.
